title: Bots in Bot games.
body:
Player bots running into jungle camps and suiciding all games, always starts with corrupting potion and runs Ghost/heal.

These two accounts have been doing this for over a week without being banned, and the script/bot in question has been used for nearly 3 years without Riot taking action.

Most likely the bots are ignored by riot and these "Botted" level 30 accounts are sold to unsuspecting players, who buy RP and then get banned, meaning riot make $$$ and look like they are doing the right thing.

STOP THE PROBLEM AT ITS SOURCE.

So here are their names

*names removed*
*name removed*

They are not human players, therefore i cannot name and shame said accounts, as they are not real players and do not fall under the said rule.

replies.body: If you mean the bots in the Co-op vs AI games, then... Yeah, that's been a problem for a really long time. You get more of them in late-night ARAM games as well. I usually just report them post-game.

Unfortunately that's not how the name and shame rule works.

Go here and report them to rito support

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Rito support can get off their arses and fix this 3 year long problem and EARN their paychecks for once.

While personally i can't disagree with you (except in the length of term of the problem) it's still not how it works.

Go ahead and put their names into a support ticket and they are likely to be banned, here it won't achieve anything because witch hunting or some shit.
